hundred mils to 600 mils of cream here

I'm just making it a little bit more

down and once you've done that you've
exposed it and it's very simple you lay
it on its back with the seeds facing you
and then I'm just gonna run my knife

and you know when it's done when it's

of course if you go for the double cream
you don't need it if you go for the

you'll whisk it in no lumps at all we're
going to let this just simmer away in

to get all of that flavor out of the

bit what we want to do in a custard is
not just make something sort of sweet
and vanilla and delicious we want it to
be silky and smooth so we do that by
taking a little bit of the hot milk to

just about you know a splash of it and

doesn't shock the eggs we can whisk it
